attributes.action: keep funding 450 hour courses at college
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 450 hour courses are cheaper courses at college which fit in round peoples busy scheduals better, they are great for older people and single parents. the government is going to stop the funding for these courses. this is one of our only options to take to get an education so as we can work rather than be on benefits or low incomes. please please sign my petition it is so important to so many people!!!
